methods.name: set
methods.description: Sets the Radio's v-model to equal the val
methods.description_zh: 将收音机的 v 模型设置为等于 val

events.name: update:model-value
events.description: Emitted when the component needs to change the model; Is also used by v-model
events.description_zh: 当组件需要更改模型时发出;也被 v-model 使用

val.description: The actual value of the option with which model value is changed
val.description_zh: 更改模型值的选项的实际值

label.description: Label to display along the radio control (or use the default slot instead of this prop)
label.description_zh: 沿无线电控件显示的标签（或使用默认插槽代替此道具）

left-label.description: Label (if any specified) should be displayed on the left side of the checkbox
left-label.description_zh: 标签（如果指定）应显示在复选框的左侧

checked-icon.description: The icon to be used when selected (instead of the default design)
checked-icon.description_zh: 选中时要使用的图标（而不是默认设计）

unchecked-icon.description: The icon to be used when un-selected (instead of the default design)
unchecked-icon.description_zh: 取消选中时要使用的图标（而不是默认设计）

color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
color.desc: Color name for background of the icon container from the Quasar Color Palette
color.description_zh: 类星体调色板中组件的颜色名称

keep-color.description: Should the color (if specified any) be kept when checkbox is unticked?
keep-color.description_zh: 取消勾选复选框时，是否应保留颜色（如果指定了任何颜色）？
